SPACEPANTS

GMTM

An online event coordination platform aimed at gamers. It addresses the common problem of coordinating groups of players in different timezones who're trying to play together. Users can create their own events and follow friends and public figures. Currently in closed beta.

C#, ASP.NET MVC, WebAPI, Boostrap
